title: Ask HN: Is HN slow today?
author: brundolf
story_text: What's normally the snappiest site on the web has been consistently taking ~5 seconds for each page load today. Extra traffic due to Slack being down, perhaps?

title.value: Ask HN: Is HN slow today?
